body.name: URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod, Magnetic Auto Face Tracking Phone Holder with 360° Rotation, No APP Required, Portable Smart Body Shooting Camera Mount for Live Vlog, Video, Rechargeable Battery
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Intelligent＆Auto Face Tracking】This auto tracking phone holder utilizes AI Cloud Eye technology, automatically recognizing and tracking your face or body, rotating 360° as you move. The auto face tracking feature ensures you stay in focus, allowing natural movement without the need to adjust the camera. No app required. Free your hands and elevate your content creation.

【2 in 1 Magnetic and Clamp Phone Holder】This face tracking tripod Connect your phone effortlessly through magnetic attachment or secure clamp, eliminating the need for intricate phone fitting steps. The magnetic function compatible with iPhone 12/13/14/15 series and other phones with magnetic rings. The clamp holder accommodates phones up to 7 inches, providing a broader range.(❤️Package comes with magnetic ring)

【360° Degree Rotation】This auto tracking tripod supports both horizontal and vertical shooting, allowing your phone to rotate 360 degrees, and the holder to rotate 180 degrees. Adjust the camera angle to meet the needs of sitting or standing shots, offering flexibility to capture every angle. Whether you're shooting vlogs, tutorials, or video calls, this tripod meets your demands.(💢Recommended for use within 3-10 ft)

【Smart Gesture Control】Our Smart shooting tripod responds to gesture control. If you need a momentary pause, simply open your palm towards the camera, and the tripod will stop working. Make an "OK" gesture, and it's ready to resume operation!

【Universal 1/4 Inch Tripod Interface】The face tracking 360 tripod for cell phone rotating bottom is detachable and can be connected to other 1/4 inch screw. This means you can use this smart face-tracking tripod with other tripods to adjust height or shooting angles, providing more flexibility and convenience for your video shooting needs—perfect for travel!(💢Recommended to use stable tripod)

【Built-in Rechargeable Battery】This content creator essentials tripod has a built-in 1800mAh rechargeable battery and USB charging port, which can last for 6-8 hours of continuous use when fully charged, making it suitable for taking anywhere! (❤️USB Type-C charging cable included in package)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't know this gadget existed. Now I am glad to have one!
reviews.reviewText: This might be the easiest gadget to use that I've ever had. Attach your phone and turn it on and it works! How cool to be able to move around while you are talking and have the tripod track your head so you are always in the frame? I didn't know there was such a gadget and also for so little money.I can use this for Facetime or Zoom and not feel like I have to sit still. Might be one of the coolest little gadgets I've picked up here on Amazon. So happy to have it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is absolutely amazing! The 360-degree feature is constantly following me, and the hand gesture to stop it is just incredible. It is highly useful for my blogging needs. I have been recommending it to anyone who is interested in TikTok, blogging or any other activity. I am taking it with me on my trip. Can't wait to use it more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tripod is straight fire!
reviews.reviewText: It’s like having a personal camera assistant that never misses a shot. The magnetic auto face tracking feature? Genius. No app required? Even better. Plus, it’s portable and rechargeable. Whether you’re vlogging or just capturing life’s moments, this tripod’s got your back! 📸🔥

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod! The magnetic function is convenient and strong, and the auto rotation really works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have to admit I was skeptical, but this is great!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted a face tracker for Facetime and Zoom calls, and I have to admit I was skeptical - but wow this thing actually works.First, I will note it's very sturdy - it sits firmly on the desk while it moves my iPhone moves around. Basically, the camera within the unit is what it uses to ensure that your face is constantly in the middle of the picture.The magnet is *VERY* STRONG - my iPhone 15 Pro was very, very secure on it, even with the case. The unit itself charges via USB-C and seems to have great battery life.Attached a video, where you can see me moving left and right and it tracking, but for privacy reasons I've shifted to the rear camera. You'll get the point though - it works! Color me impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works perfectly and looks very good. My little girl loves it. Thank you very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: My husband is starting a grilling channel. This was to help him video. He gave it a go today and worked exactly as we expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod: The Magnetic Maestro of Cinematic Capture
reviews.reviewText: Prepare to be swept into the realm of unparalleled innovation as we delve into the saga of the URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod – a magnetic marvel that stands at the forefront of cinematic phone capture. This isn't just a tripod; it's a technological symphony that choreographs your every move into a mesmerizing masterpiece.The magnetic allure of the Auto Face Tracking Phone Holder is the first hint at the extraordinary journey ahead. As my device effortlessly adhered to its magnetic embrace, I felt a sense of alignment – a silent pact between technology and creativity, ready to unfold the visual narrative I envisioned.Setting up this tripod was a revelation in simplicity. The user-friendly design unveiled a world where even the most technologically challenged could become directors of their own cinematic tales. The magnetic auto face tracking feature, once initiated, transformed my phone into a sentient storyteller, seamlessly following my every movement like a devoted cinematographer.As I embarked on a journey of self-capture, the Auto Face Tracking Tripod exhibited an uncanny intuition, anticipating my motions and framing each shot with a precision that rivaled professional videography. The magnetic holder, acting as a silent conductor, orchestrated a visual symphony that transcended the boundaries of mere recording – it was a dance between technology and artistry.But the true brilliance of this tripod emerged during dynamic scenes. Whether capturing action-packed adventures or spontaneous moments, the auto face tracking technology proved to be a cinematic guardian angel, ensuring that the focus remained on the star of the show – me. It's not just a tripod; it's a co-director in the creation of your visual opus.The versatility of the URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod extended beyond mere face tracking. Its magnetic holder effortlessly detached, transforming into a multi-functional accessory for selfies, group shots, and even unconventional angles that sparked a newfound creativity within me.In conclusion, the URTRY Auto Face Tracking Tripod isn't just a device; it's a technological maestro that transforms ordinary moments into cinematic spectacles. The magnetic allure, coupled with the intuitive face tracking, elevates this tripod to a league of its own. It's time to embrace the future of visual storytelling, where every movement becomes a frame, and every frame tells a story – URTRY, the magnetic muse of cinematic capture!
